places_with_reviews.name: The Tattva - A Boutique Resort
address: Shri Badrinath Road, near Tapovan Taxi Stand, Joshimath, Uttarakhand 246443, India

reviews.text:
We were a group of 4 women and had booked the deluxe cottage and basic room.
The rooms were clean although we had to ask the staff to get the basic stuff like toiletries & washroom mat.
Service was good and prompt, they even provided bonfire.
The complimentary breakfast did have a good variety however it looks like the chef couldn't make up their mind about the amount of salt to be added. Some days they added too much, other days, the dishes were pretty bland.
Overall the location and service and safety wise, this is a pretty good choice.

Not built for people with accessibility issues (no lifts, lots of floors) but other than that a very good stay. Very good view of mountains from Supreme rooms and dining areas. Polite people and great service.

Had a great experience at the Tatva  hotel. One of the best places  to stay at Joshimath
The views of mountains are absolutely breathtaking  from the hotel . Surprisingly the food was awesome given the poor experience we had at some of the restaurants in Dehradun.

The staff are very polite and the service was exemplary.

Overall great stay!!

Room wasn’t good. Bathroom lock was broken. Bathroom was smelly. Poor sound insulation in the room. Had a disturbed nights sleep. Could hear everything going on outside. Access to restaurant is also from room corridor. So obviously room won’t be silent. Room heating was good along with electric blankets. Beds were comfy. Staff is polite and service was good. Food was average. You really need to improve the food quality. Restaurant is a nice place to sit at. We checked out early only because we weren’t comfortable. There was not a single person available when we were checking out around 6 am.

We have a nice experience in a 2 day stay in Tattva Resort in Josimath.The location
of the resort is great.. The ice laden mountain is clearly visible from the deck which is soothing to eyes. The food quality of the restaurant is quite delicious.Few points want to mention.. The room should be more spacious according to the premium price..And for complete privacy instead of glass window..wooden or any covered wall should be provided.

places_with_reviews.name: Aaryam Resort, Auli
address: Auli Rd, Auli, Lower, Joshimath, Uttarakhand 246443, India

reviews.text:
Spacious and tastefully decorated rooms with  elegant furnishings, and all the amenities you need for a rejuvenating retreat. Whether you're an adventure seeker or a relaxation enthusiast, there's something for everyone at Aaryam Resort. Explore the surrounding trails on a guided hike or simply soak in the serenity of nature.
Over all experience was great ❣️ staff was very nice and quick responsive.

I stayed here for 2 nights. It felt like the best stay in joshimath. The rooms were spacious, clean and beautiful. They provided a room heater and electric blanket to make us feel comfortable as it was very cold. I had experienced the first snowfall of my life here. Their service and food is exceptional.

Amazing place to visit. This resort is the best place to stay for this once in a lifetime trip. The service was amazing, all the people were very helpful and friendly and they have contacts for every activity and transportation system needed to experience the full enjoyment of this place. The staff is available 24x7. The food is fresh and tasty as well.

I lost my go pro with accessories in the Auli. I came here and the Hotel team helped me in every way possible. They were very helpful and calm. They showed us CcTv videos just in case. It is a little bumpy and off-road to reach here but it is worth it. The staff is very good. Had enough parking. The main Auli skiing resort is not very far from here.

We had an amazing experience of 2 days. The day we reached it was my anniversary and they ensured to make it memorable by decorating our room with tempting cake. Location of property will mesmerize you. Hospitality was also best. Overall best place to have stay

places_with_reviews.name: Auli Hill Station
address: Pine palace hotel, Auli, Auli Laga Salude, Uttarakhand 246443, India

reviews.text:
Auli is the best place to see a magnificent view of the Himalayan ranges. The hotel we found had a heater, which made the low temperature more comfortable in the room.
Limited food options. Street food options were pretty good.

Nice place in winters not a good place for summers. Come here after 15th January if you want to see proper snow covered mountains and want to enjoy winter sports like skiing, ice skating etc. Also, if you want to go by ropeway. Book the ropeway well in advance online via. Internet otherwise you'll not get ropeway tickets as there are only limited slots and in each slot only 25 people are allowed one time.
Best adventures place👌

Been there only for an hour in summer, while raining. Unfortunately missed ropeway because of traffic on the way from Joshimath and heavy rain added to that.
Took a ride on Chair lift. But felt its slippery and not safe. Actually they arranged us a last ride little after their usual closing time. I should appreciate them for being so sensible as we travelled so long to get there.

We got some great views of Nanda Devi and Trishul peaks after the rain settled and clouds gave us some way.
Sleeping beauty , Hathi parbat are others..

Best season to visit is in March to April second week, and you can witness snow fall and if you are lucky enough you can see far mountain peaks as well.
Great Himalaya view

places_with_reviews.name: Ski resort GMVN Auli
address: GHP8+X4H, Auli Rd, Joshimath, Auli Laga Salude, Uttarakhand 246443, India

reviews.text:
Everything about this place is excellent. The location, the resort, the staff and their service and the weather. We stayed here for 3 days and it was a refreshing and relaxing experience. The rooms are fantastic. This property belongs to govt. And that is why the  rates are fixed. The staff is very polite and cooperative.
The best part that we did not expect in such cold weather was their restaurant facility. The food was tremendous and tasty like anything. Be it lunch, breakfast or dinner. Each and every item on the menu was excellent and was served with utmost etiquette.  We had a great time here. It's a premium property don't expect it for cheap

Located near tower 8, this resort is excellent. You can reach there by car in summer and by cable car in winter. Has a great view, food is little costly but very tasty. Room service available. All kinds of amenities were provided. Chair lift is easily accessible. We stayed in deluxe Hut which is difficult for aged people.

Absolutely horrible place!!!! Would request all tourists to never book this (especially foreigners). The service staff is extremely amateur. They don’t even know how to treat or talk to a guest. The food was stale and expensive- lemon ginger tea had no ginger. The rooms are terrible. I belong to Uttarakhand and I am ashamed of this quality. I don’t know who to blame for this - the government, or the people. They have killed “athithi Devo bhava”.

Currently I am staying in this resort. Booked an economy room. After checking in found there is problem with washroom. They tried fixing it. No maintenance. Shifted to another room. Full of bad smell. Went to reception for a conversation but they told it's a government resort so it's like this and they don't have time for maintenance. Similarly the person in the reception told that we got another room as today it's vacant otherwise we have to stay there only. With washroom problem. This is the feedback I can share. Really a bad stay.

I am currently in delux room which I booked online, this is 24th December, 2023. I must say the rooms, staff and food was less than average for 5k per night. The heater is not working at all and we are staying in cold. Staff is giving vague responses to these complaints. No help whatsoever. Really a bad place and I think u should avoid it completely.

places_with_reviews.name: Blue Poppy Resort
address: near GMVN, Auli, Auli Laga Salude, Uttarakhand 246443, India

reviews.text: The location is unbeatable, situated conveniently close to the cable car, and offers stunning views of the peaks from both the bedroom and restaurant. The food quality is excellent, with a focus on pure vegetarian dishes. The staff are incredibly friendly and cooperative, making the stay even more enjoyable. I'm definitely looking forward to staying here again in the future.

Amazing hotel with an awesome view!! Loved staying here, the staff was genuinely welcoming and made sure we had a comfortable stay. Food was also really good. Rooms were also hygienic. I highly recommend this place.

I just had a 2 night stay, superb service and location. The manager also provided good guidance on nearby attractions.
Do note, you would have to climb down 200 meters from the main road to reach the resort. The team would carry the required luggage but if you have issues walking on rock surface, do verify.

I recently stayed at a resort in Uttarakhand and was very delighted. The location was stunning, nestled among the hills. The staff was quite welcoming, and the accommodations were clean and comfy. The resort provided a variety of activities and services to keep everyone occupied. The eating experience was outstanding . Overall, my time at the resort was a fantastic and restorative experience, and I would strongly suggest it to anyone looking for a peaceful escape in blue poppy resort.
visited in this property last month with my family, hotel was beautiful surroundings, very clean, staff was very polite, excellent service. also food was very testy, value for money. must go...

amazing hotel awesome view loved staying staff genuinely welcoming made sure comfortable stay food also really good rooms also hygienic highly recommend place

night stay superb service location manager also provided good guidance nearby attractions note would climb meters main road reach resort team would carry required luggage issues walking rock surface verify

recently stayed resort uttarakhand delighted location stunning nestled among hills staff quite welcoming accommodations clean comfy resort provided variety activities services keep everyone occupied eating experience outstanding overall time resort fantastic restorative experience would strongly suggest anyone looking peaceful escape blue poppy resort
visited property last month family hotel beautiful surroundings clean staff polite excellent service also food testy value money must go

places_with_reviews.name: Tathastu Maitri Ski Resort, Joshimath
address: Ravigram Village, Near Fire Brigade Station Tapovan, Road, Joshimath, Uttarakhand 246443, India

reviews.text: Staff was caring, friendly, and hospitable. The location is excellent. It’s very calm and the price we pay is worth it. Our experience was amazing. The hotel was clean and neat and well taken care of. Circuit, the hotel puppy was very cute and it’s a nice touch for customers who are animal lovers and can play with the dog. Everything was great. If I had any suggestions it would be to place trash cans through the resort to reduce littering but other than that it was a 5 star experience.

Remarkable locations, breath taking views and great staff make the staying here very memorable.

Initially I was hesitant to take up the rooms at the first level because I felt they were unnecessarily expensive. We were settling down for the lower levels because they were relatively cheaper. My wife had some issues to climb up and down (pretty steep steps). It was a pleasant surprise for us when the sales team offered us the first level rooms for the same price (though this is off-season and not many guest at all). Still it was a great way to work towards customer satisfaction - and we really appreciated the team for this gesture.

It was a real pleasure to meet Mr Negi (one of the managerial staff) who would take time and effort to explain (in detail) about every possible temple, places of visit. Very rare to find such persons who would genuinely feel proud of our culture, our heritage and would encourage visitors to appreciate the history of the places. Since the purpose of my visit is more in these lines (than mere entertainment), I could easily connect with his line of thinking.

Other staff members, chef, food everything make you feel happy in this place

I recently had an exceptional stay at a mountain hotel that left an indelible mark on my experience. The staff's warmth and hospitality truly elevated the entire visit. From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with genuine smiles and a willingness to assist.

The hotel staff went above and beyond to ensure every aspect of my stay was comfortable. Their attentiveness to details, from room cleanliness to prompt room service, was remarkable. The genuine friendliness of the staff created a welcoming atmosphere that made me feel right at home in the serene mountain setting.

The breathtaking views from the hotel added an extra layer of magic to the stay. Waking up to the sight of majestic mountains and fresh air was invigorating. The staff's local knowledge also came in handy, as they provided excellent recommendations for nearby hiking trails and scenic spots.

Overall, my stay at this mountain hotel was a perfect blend of natural beauty, comfort, and exceptional service. The staff's genuine kindness and dedication special mention of a person named Raja to ensuring a memorable experience make this establishment stand out. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone seeking a peaceful retreat in the mountains, coupled with impeccable service and warm hospitality.

Premium rooms are spacious with best of amenities provided in the room as well as in the resort.
Entire team is always ready to help and they are prompt in responding to any need.
Kudos to Bhupendra Rana and entire support team for making the stay worth remembering.
Property is in very good location and well maintained.

I would highly recommend this resort to everyone for a great stay.

Excellent hotel and superb service. All staff was very polite, courteous and responsive. Location is also nice with a good view of the mountains. Special mention of Raja Negi who was very attentive.
Highly recommended!!

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Uday Palace Joshimath

reviews.text:
We have stayed in the Hotel Uday Palace for 3 nights / 2 days. One of the best places to stay in terms of cleanliness of rooms, washrooms, and food was of amazing. Great hospitality by the Manager Mr. Harish , you can reach out to him regarding any problem and he'll help you out for sure.
Kudos to entire Staff especially Mohit & Om Prakashji were of great help. Rahul & Dipendra ji from the kitchen staff were amazing.

We haven't had booked any stay in Joshimath but we found some good reviews for the Uday Palace & decided to see the hotel. Surprisingly, once we saw the rooms & the deal they offered, we immediately booked the place.
I strongly recommend this place.

The rooms are nice, especially the ones with balcony. Staff is cordial. Food is good but they need prior intimation as availability is limited (expected as per the location). Overall a decent experience

At 2k Rooms give all the basic facilities required but services seems inadequate to give complete  satisfaction. Even tea was refused during checkin at just around 7PM due to overcrowded restaurant. It seems they can only cater properly when it is less crowded.

Very good, polite and attentive staff  attended us.
The room was nice with all amenities mentioned.
We booked it through our tour organiser and got satisfied.
The package was inclusive of breakfast and dinner which we enjoyed. The food was tasty. The warm drinking water was also made available as per our requirement.

The location is very near to Shri Laxmi Narsinha Mandir which is visited in the morning.
They also helped for the Guide for Auli ski point trekking.

Best hotel near the narshinh mandir, good view of joshimath, food quality is also good.
Just need to take care of child bez window and balcony having no grill so possibility to fall down child from heights...

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Panchvati Inn
address: Singhdhar, Bus Stand, Joshimath, Uttarakhand 246443, India

reviews.text: During our recent stay at Hotel Panchvati Inn, we were thoroughly impressed with the level of comfort provided by the accommodations as well as the exceptional service offered by their staff. Not only did our room exceed our expectations in terms of cleanliness and amenities, but the food served in the hotel's restaurant was also a standout feature - delicious dishes prepared with fresh ingredients left us wanting more! We highly recommend Hotel Panchvati Inn for anyone seeking an enjoyable stay with top-notch hospitality in this area.

Hotel Panchvati Inn is truly a culinary delight with a wide range of delicious dishes that are bound to satisfy any palate. The food is exceptional in quality, taste and presentation, making it a must-visit for any food connoisseur. The diverse menu offers a variety of options, including traditional Indian cuisine and international favorites, all cooked to perfection. The ambiance adds to the overall dining experience, with attentive service and a warm, inviting atmosphere. Overall, Hotel Panchvati Inn is a top choice for those seeking a memorable dining experience with exceptional food

Peaceful location with great views is the highlight of the place. Amitji takes care of the customers by personally taking time to enquire all the details. We were pleasantly surprised with an offer for upgradation of the room category (may be because of off-season ..nevertheless a very nice gesture from the hotel)

Food, staff everything deserve an A+ :-) We would definitely recommend this place for those peace loving people looking for a good accommodation. BTW Narasing Mandir which is one of the main temples to be visited is very near by ...those who would love to walk in Himalayas (like we do) can do so from the Hotel!!!
Stay was too good, friendly staffs, restaurant was clean and food was delicious!! Overall best stay! Surely will recommend others🙂
Very Good service, Food is very good. Loved everything we ate here. Fast and Quality service. Thumbs up to Girish for a good service

places_with_reviews.name: The Cliff Top Club, Auli
address: Auli Skiing Village, Joshimath, Auli Laga Salude, Uttarakhand 246443, India

reviews.text:
It was a bad experience for our family. We have paid the amount in advance which was on higher side, but when we saw the rooms not in good condition, bath tub was not working and others. We have booked for 2 nights but due to this reason we liked to move to other hotel. We have told them to pay us for the 01 days but still they have not refunded the amount. We are daily call them for our hard earn money.

It has been since 04 months now we haven't received the money from the hotel as promised by them
I visit in cliff top club, Auli and here rooms and service are best and also location is soo beautiful. The view from the hotel is awesome

Good staff service,nice Room. nice budget
Coprative staff all foods very testi good location 👌
The destination Is very wonderful  . There is Excellent service and care here . And it is a very nice place for enjoying holiday or trip .
Thanku so much for best quality rooms, service and Location 💐

places_with_reviews.name: hotel mount view annexy
address: Shankaracharya Math, Upper Bazar, Joshimath, Uttarakhand 246443, India

reviews.text:
Worst experience ever... Worst hotel anyone can ever live in.
No lift in the hotel.
Food is very bad.
No shower provided in washroom.
Heater was at extra cost but it was okay okay, heater was not really heating the room. Wall between room and washroom was leaking.
Door is so defective that you can get stuck inside the washroom.
Roof is leaking. In so much cold we have to stay in a room with leaking water.

Mr. Sanjeev was really rude while checking out. We were getting late due to water leakage, no shower and every discomfort and instead of helping he chose to be rude.
Complete disaster.
This is like second Home for me!!! Service, facilities was good.. Room cleaning was awesome food was delicious ..must stay in this hotel thanks to all staff😀👍

Very bad experience.
Room size is very small.
Staff is very rude very bad service.
False images of the room are shown on websites.
The room which was given to us did not had the lock and still they did not change the room.
Not at all worth spending money on this hotel..

These guys are fraudsters, please don't book rooms here. They will ask for advance money once you paid it congratulations you are cheated by them. Because they will promise something and will give nothing, not even room.
Food was great good place to stay if you are planning to visit badrinath temple it is almost 40 kms far. It is located between the market .Rooms are also great comfortable stay.
